data.name: Early fault detection for manufacturing eqiupments

technical_summary.text_summary: Manufacturers increasingly collect big data from Internet of Things (IoT) sensors in their factories and products and using different algorithms for the collected data to detect warning signs of expensive failures before they occur.

Simple media monitoring is no longer what marketers need: they need advanced tools to filter through millions of blogs, websites and social media posts to stay abreast of what’s going on in the industry.

Discretely positioned cameras can inform Hosts of the imminent approach of VIP’s and give them the extra insight to be able to greet guests by name and affirm the personal relationship they want to convey.
You no longer need to waste your time browsing the different websites to see the duplicated or irrelevant information. This model will find  unique articles that match your interests.

data.name: Identify Vehicles Types in South Easth Asia

technical_summary.text_summary: This model is specifically trained with Vehicle images from south east asia to provide high accurate results in idenitfying vehicles in the area at a granular level.

data.name: Stock prediction appraoch for Sri Lanka

origin.author: NLP Author boi
origin.paper: Stock prediction: Integrating text mining approach using real-time news

technical_summary.text_summary: Mining textual documents and time series concurrently, such as predicting the movements of stock prices based on news articles, is an emerging topic in data mining society nowadays.P
